<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1112023-10-18" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4441"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi don bsdus pa</rs> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">smra ba'i seng ge | ngag gi dbang phyug | 'chad gra'i slob dpon | sgra sgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po | rngog dge slong blo ldan shes rab </rs>kyis mdzad pa <lb n="40a4"/> rdzogs s+hyo ||<anchor xml:id="a10"/> he he || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44012023-10-11" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4760">chos mngon pa mdzod kyi sbyor tik</rs>rs bzhugs s+ho || dge'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex44012023-09-12"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">grub pa brnyes pa</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mkhas btsun</rs> stong phrag du ma byon cing bzhugs pa'i gnas mchog <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">chos <lb n="38a4"/>grwa chen po dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang</rs> gi 'khris na yod pa'i <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5663">mthong smon dgu gling</rs> gi bzhi thog tu | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mchims sku mched</rs> <anchor xml:id="a3"/>kyi zhabs kyi pad mo la spyi bos gtugs pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4016">shAkya'i btsun pa bsod nams <lb n="38a5"/>ye shes</rs> kyis legs par sbyar ba'o ||
            <milestone unit="section" n="Post-colophon verse"/>'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang | 'gro ba mang po la phan par gyur cig || 
            <milestone unit="section" n="scribe colophon"/> <lb n="38a6"/>yi ge pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5770">rin chen bzang po</rs>'o || dge'o || bkra shis par gyur cig |||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-20-34" status="unreviewed"><pb edRef="inst:5593" n="1b"/><lb edRef="inst:5593" n="1b1"/><pb edRef="inst:4770" n="1b"/> <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="1b1"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4771"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5553">tshad ma sde bdun</rs> gyi don phyogs cig du bsdus pa (g)zha(n) gyi phyogs tha(ms cad) las rnam par rgyal ba [zhes bya ba] | </rs></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-39-05" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">dbu ma snang sel ba kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> snang ba dgag bya yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-08-30" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><!--person could be Indian or Tibetan-->
            yang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">dbu ma ba kha cig</rs> snang pa la bden par zhen pa'i blo dgag bya yin ste | nyes pa thams cad <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="3a4"/> <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="3a4"/> kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-50-39" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re snang ba stong ba'i tshogs don de bsgrub <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="4a3"/> bya yin zhing | snang ldog kun rdzob kyi bden pa stong ldog don dam pa'i bden pa bden 2 ngo bo 1 pa yin no zhe na |
            snang ba dang ngo bo 1 pa'i stong nyid de <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="tshe na"/> don dam  <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="3a9"/> pa'i bden pa ma yin te | skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir te | snang ba skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir ro | gzhan yang don dam bden pa skye 'gag byed par thal |<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="4a4"/>snang pa skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir | rtags tshad ma khyab pa med na bden gnyis ngo bo gcig pa nyams so ||
            'dod na 'gag pa med pa skye med pa zhes so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-29-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">gangs can pa</rs> thams cad sems tsam pa gnyis ka'i lugs <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="6b9"/> 'gog pa ni | rang gzhung sems tsam du bshad pa dang 'gal lo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-51-23" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni don spyi 'dzin pa yin <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="7a7"/> no zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-54-20" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:rtog_pa">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid sgra don 'dzin pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-51-43" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re mtshan nyid tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid ni chos 3 tshang pa yin no ||
            gsum pa gang zhe na |
            mtshan gzhi la grub pa dang | rdzas su yod pa dang | rigs mi <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a2"/> mthun gyi spyi dang | dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin no zhe na |
            de ltar na mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin nam mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin | 
            dang po ltar na bum pa mi rtag par mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe | mtshan nyid <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a3"/> skyon med du thal | chos 3 po de thang pa'i phyir ro ||
            2 pa ltar na dkar zal ba glang du mtshon pa la nog shal lasogs pa 'dus pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid skyon med ma yin par thal | mtshan nyid de mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal ma yin pa'i phyir ro || 
            ma grub na nog shal lasogs 'dus pa <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a4"/> de chon | ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung gi ltago pa yin par thal | ba lang gi tha snyad byar mi rung dang dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir ro || ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung nyid bzhin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-48-11" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad du mtshon pa la mtshon bya'i don ldog gzhi la grub mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a5"/> mtshan nyid skyon med yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-13-00" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bsdus pa smra ba</rs> la mkhas par grags pa yang khan 3 du 'khams ngan zhes lan 'debs par snang ngo ||<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a9"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-54-39" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> | mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de mtshan nyid ma yin pas nyes pa dang po med do || chos 3 tshang pa de mtshan nyid tha snyad kyis rang ldog la brten par ma zhugs pas mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de rigs mi mthun yin yang khyab ches par thal ba'i skyon med do || chos 3 tshang pa de mtshon ldan gyi <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13b8"/> gzhi la zhugs pas | mtshon bya la mi srid par htla ba'i nyes pa med do || zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0311-17-10" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            ldog pa la brten par mtshon pa'i tshe mtshon <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="14a5"/> bya de rten kyi rigs mi mthun dang bsal bya rigs mi mthun 2 su yod pa de khong du ma chud par rang gi mtshon bya rigs mi mthun du 'thad do zhes zer ba ni shes pa bas smra ba rings pa'i gtam yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-11-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3887">'jam pa'i rdo rje</rs> na re | rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni | chos gang zhig mtshan gzhi la ji ltar bkod pa ltar grub cing don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="14b8"/> pa'o zhe na |
            bum pa dngos po'i tha snyad ud mtshon pa la ba lang gi tha snyad mtahn nyid du bkod pa de rang ldog rzdas ma grub ma yin par thal | gzhi la grub ma tshang pa'i phyir | 'dod na rang ldog rdzas yod du thal lo || des na rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni chos gang zhig don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="14b9"/> pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-55-06" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            'di la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> gzhan gyi mtshon bya mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yod pa yin te | nog shal lasogs 'dus pa mtshon bya | ba lang gi tha nsyad dang po de ba lang gi tha snyad 2 pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no | zhes zer ba ni </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-52-17" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge na re</rs> byas pa'i tha snyad byas pa'i tha snyad du mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa de mtshon 'dod med nas mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi la <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="16a3"/> mi srid pa yin ste | mtshan gzhi dang mtshon bya tha dad med pa'i phyir ro zhe na |
            ba lang gi tha snyad tshad mas grub pa'i tshe nog shal lasogs 'dus pa de ba lang gi tha snyad la ltos te mtshan nyid skyon myed po ma yin par thal | <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="13a5"/> mtshon 'dod med pa'i phyir ro ||
            rtags tshad ma | khyab pa med na mtshon 'dod med pa mtshan nyid kyi skyon <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="16a4"/> yin pa nyams so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-49-30" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brton 'grus seng ge</rs> na re | sems can rtsam po la ba lang gi tha snyad khyab byed du mod (read: med) par mtshon <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="16b3"/> ************* mtshon par mi nus pas mtshan nyid kyi skyon can yin no || de yang mtshon bya la ltos pa'i skyon ma yin ste mtshan nyid kyis mtshan gzhi la ma khyab pa'i skyon yin no zhe na |
            rten rtsam du yod pa de gang zhes dri'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-56-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            lnga pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> | dkar zal mtshan gzhi ba lang gi tha snyad dkar zal kho na la yod par mtshon | nog shal laosgs 'dus pa dkar zla kho na la yod pa mtshan ynid du <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="17a4"/> ************* khyab ches nas mtshan gzhi ' dkar zla las gzhan nag sgyur la khyab ches pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-46-46" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba na re</rs> mtshan nyid kyi skyon 3 du ma 'dus pa rnam bcad med pa zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan bzhi pa yang yod do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-47-52" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            gnyis pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">rin chen grags</rs> na re [gangs pa zhe'u]<!-- (compl. Tshad bsdus p.90= mtshan nyid kyi skyon thams cad mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan du mi srid par 'dus zer ro ||(cf. Tshad bsdus accepted position p. 91)--></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-51-06" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re mtshon bya'i tha snyadkyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par bzhag bya gzhi la grub pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-51-58" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5573">bdag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re rdzas chos ldog chos kyi mtshyd ni rim pa bzhin du rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos ma lus pa la khyab byed du rten pa dang | rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos 'ga' zhig la rten yang 'ga' <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="18b9"/> zhig la mi<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="22b3"/> rten pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-53-31" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            khas blangs brjod pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5573">bgag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re | 'jig myed la byas yod bkag pa lta bu'i med dgag de rtags kyi bsgrub bya yin zhing rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin la | 'jig myed byas yin la | 'jig myed byas <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="21b3"/> yod kyis stong pa'i tshogs don ma yin dgag de yang rtags kyi <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="25b4"/>bsgrub bya dang rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin lo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-46-28" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba chen po de na re</rs> | ljon shing 'gror snang gi shes pa kha dog la tshad ma yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-49-31" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            2 pa ltar na rjes dpag * rtog baral du thal | rtog 31a3 pa'i ldog pa ma yin pa'i phyiro zhe na |
            'di'i len du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge </rs>na re rang yul la ltos te rtog pa'i rdzas dang bral ba de yin zer ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-56-24" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge </rs>rtog par mtshon pa'i mtshan gzhi ma yin pa de yin no zer |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-57-56" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs kyi tshyad <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="43a2"/>  ni bsgrub bya chon dang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa dang mi mthun pa de yin no zhe na |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-56-43" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub kyang phyogs 1 la ma grub pa ni sgra la <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="46b4"/> rtsol byung khyab byed du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'am | sgra la rtsol byung rten rtsam du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'o || zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-59-11" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            tshogs pa rtags su bkod pa'i tshe ya rgyal 1 chos can la brten yang ya gyal 1 chos can la mi rten na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin ste | ya gyal khegs pas tshogs pa khegs pa'i phyir | tshogs pa chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe | rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la ma grub kyang rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub na <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="46b7"/> phyogs chos grub pas grub pa yin te | <?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>rigs kyi bye brag<?oxy_comment_end?> snang pa dang stong pa'i tshogs don chos can bsgrub pa'i tha snyad du byar rung ste | bsgrub chos ma dor ba yin pa'i phyir zhes rtags su bkod pa'i tshe | bsgrub chos ma dor ba de stong nyid la ma grub kyang snang pa la grub pas snang stong tshogs pa la brten pa'i phyogs chos grub pa bzhin no ||<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="46b8"/> spyi rtags su bkod pa'i tshe bye brag cig chos can la ma grub kyang bye brag 1 chos can la grub na phyogs chos grub pas khyab pa yin ste | rigs kyi bye brag grub pas spyi 'grub pa'i phyir | spyi chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe chos can gyi bye brag 1 la rtags grub kyang chos can gyi bye brag 1 'ang rtags ma grub na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin no || zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos 46b9 kyi seng ge </rs>smra'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-49-51" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re rtags kyi tshyad phyoos dang ldog pa'i khyab pa 2 yin zhing rjes 'gro yod kyang rtags kyi tshyad ma yin no zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-22-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            khas blangs brjod pa ni | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kun gyi bshes gnyen</rs> na re | go byed rtags kyi 'brel pa don la med de | spyi 'brel don la med pa'i phyir te | spyi don la med pa'i phyir dang | chos 1 la <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="54b1"/> 'brel pa mi 'thad cing 'brel pa po 'brel yul gyi chos 2 tshogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex450120240625352" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3775">'brel pa brtags pa</rs> las | <quote source="db:3775" n="v. 1">de phyir dngos po thams cad kyi || 'brel pa yang dag <abbr>nyid du</abbr> med</quote> ces so || des na 48b5 'brel pa don la med pas bsgrub bya'i chos dang rtags kyang don la med ces grag go ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-50-09" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            dang po ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge na re </rs>thal 'gyur rang rgyud la mi 'khrul <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="63a7"/> ba yin te | de ('di) 2 rtogs pa gnad 1 pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-15-50" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4771">gzhan gyi phyogs thamd las rnaM par rgyal ba</rs> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong sing ha shri</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4332">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par brtsaMs te | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5574">dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o || rdzogs sho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-15-51" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4771">rigs pa'i de nyid gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">rigs pas smra <abbr>77a5</abbr> ba'i dge' sbyong sing ha shri</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4332">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par brtsams te || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5574">dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o || bkra shis par gyur cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex22032023-09-18-09:59:18" status="unreviewed"><pb n="[40b2]"/> <rs type="work">sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bshad sbyar</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon ye shes zhabs</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="=Buddhajñānapāda"?><?oxy_comment_end?> kyi dgongs pa la 'khrul pa spang pa'i phyir| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5878">shag kya'i rge [dge] slong ye shes rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis sbyar ba'o|| rdzogs so|| ×|| ×|| <pb n="[40b3]"/> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5656">rgyan dkar × phug<anchor xml:id="a1"/> </rs>du bris so|| ×|| ||<rs type="work">shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa</rs>’i|  don la dmyigs shing ’khrul pa’i skyon rnams sel cing sku × ’khrungs pa’i| <rs type="person" ana="">dam pa shes rab ’bar</rs> zhes grags| chu snod cig nas cig byo bzhin| don dang tshig rnams rdzogs par yang’| ’gro la phan phyir don rnams sgrogs <pb n="[40b4]"/> gsregs? don<rs type="person" ana=""> ye shes rgyal</rs> zhes grags| skye* shis ’jigs nas chos rgyad bor| |don tsam snang yang bye brag rjed [=brjed?]| dran pa bso phyir <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4335">chos ’khor bsam yas</rs> dag du bris| <rs type="person" ana="">dge’ bshes zhug ston</rs> zhes byar grags|| ’gro ba ’dul kyin bzhan don mdzad| *thos mang sems <note type="gloss">dang</note> sims? kyi * me long lta|| <pb n="[40b5]"/> <rs type="person" ana="">shes rab thog po</rs> zhes su grags|| || || ||ItI|| ||</seg>
source: 1_022_03_ Ye shes rgyal mtshan _ bsdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bshad sbyar.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-45-44" type="excerpt" status="reviewed">
            <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5537"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3713"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3694">bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po</rs> rgya cher bshad pa</rs> <choice><sic>'di</sic><corr>'i</corr></choice> don bsdus pa</rs> ni rnam pa bzhi ste | ngag dang po'i don dang | mdo'i lus rnam par gzhag ba dang | yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang | yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-46-47" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:dgos_brel">
            dgos 'brel du <choice><orig>b(k)od</orig><reg>bkod</reg></choice> pa'i dgos pa ni | nges pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang | don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gis 'jug pa dang | gzhan gi log par rtogs pa spang ba gsum bzhag nas | gzhung mdzes par bya ba yin no || zhes <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5530">skabs gzhan</rs> <choice><orig>‹du›</orig><reg>du</reg></choice> gtan la phab pa bzhin du shes par bya'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-26-37" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!-- "slob dpon gzhan" might be Indian or Tibetan-->
            'on kyang <quote source="db:3694">'di skad bdag gis thos pa</quote> zhes bya bas gtsor brjod pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa <lb n="2a7"/> dang dngos nyid du yin ba dang | rtogs pa ma yin <choice><orig> ‹par›</orig><reg>par</reg> </choice><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">slob dpon gzhan</rs> gis bshad pa bzhin blta ste | 'dir ni cung zad nor par bshad pa yin no || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-2412-02-43" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!--kha cig could be Indian or Tibetan-->
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha<choice><orig>ci‹g›</orig><reg>cig</reg> </choice> </rs> las las kyi bdud dang lngar gsungs ba der ni nyon mongs pa dang las gnyi gas phung po<choice><orig>lha‹g›</orig><reg>lhag</reg> </choice> ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i<choice><orig>‹ba›r</orig><reg>bar</reg> </choice> du gcod pa'i <lb n="2b2"/> phyir ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-31-27" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon">
            <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5537"> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3713"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3694">shes rab snying po</rs>'i rgya cher 'grel</rs> gi bshad pa</rs>| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba slob dpon blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70426-04-202313.33" status="reviewed">
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs> la don bzhi ste |
          [1] spyi'i don lus rnam par gzhag pa dang | [2] 'bras bu dkon mchog gi don dang | [3] de sgrub par byed pa'i rigs kyi don dang | [4] bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70426-04-202313.40" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon">
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4490"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs>'i bsdus pa'i don</rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3831" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba'o || || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-51-15" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
                  <pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5517"> tshad ma rnam nges kyi 'grel bshad</rs><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5518"> bo dong 'jam dbyangs</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-49-04" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5552">bram ze chen po</rs>'i rjes su 'brang ba [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> na re| don bden pa rtogs pa chos gsum tshang ba yin la| de yang don ni shes bya'i gnas lugs yin la| bden pa ni ji ltar yin pa'am yod ltar gnas pa'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-34-10" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            []gsum pa yid dpyod ni rtags la ma brten par sngar ma rtogs pa'i lkog gyur dngos su rtogs pa yin no ce na| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| blo 'dod rgyal ba yin pas gnas skabs don dang mthun yang log pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te| don med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir te| dper na du ba dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i rlangs pa ni me dang lhan cig yod kyang me'i 'bras bu ma yin te| me dang ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs so zhes zer ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-21-55" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <lb n="5a5"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3892"> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]</rs>zhal nas| yid dpyod tshad mar thal te| don bden pa gsar du nges pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-35-00" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pas the tshom ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis kar 'dzin pa yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin la| rgyu mtshan med pa dang log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma phebs pa can yang the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes grag go |
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| de mi rigs te| the tshom gyis gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yongs su ma bcad pa'i phyir dang | log pa'i shes pa ni don de ma yin du yongs su <lb n="5a7"/>gcod byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-23-13" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]/</rs>zhal nas| the tshom de dang log pa'i shes pa gcig pa mi srid de| the tshom ni [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed gnod byed gang gi yang mthar ma thug pa yin la| log pa'i shes pa la ni gnod byed nges pa min pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-35-21" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| rnam pa gnyis zhes brjod pa ni| gnyis su grangs nges par gzung ba'i don du ste| de lta ma yin na| re shig 'dir 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi| dbye ba gzhan yang srid do zhes dogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni mi bden te| 'o zhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i dgos pa bkag pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-23-13">gzhan yang gzhal bya yul dus kyi mthar thug pa rang gi mtshan nyid de ma yin rnam par bcad pa spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kho <lb n="7a4"/>na rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro||[]zhes <rs type="work">[\[]ti ka [;]ṭikka</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">[\]]mkhan po [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> [\[]gsung [;]gsungs [\]]pa'ang legs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-35-45" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| tha snyad pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub bya 'di ni tshad ma'i gzhal bya yin pas dngos po'i chos gcig yin la| de'ang tshad mas grub zin pa de nyid ma yin gyi rang bzhin sems dpa'i blos dpyad na don de la sngar bkod pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan gyis chos mi 'dra ba bkag pa mi slu ba'i yul gyi bsgrub bya'o|| rjes dpag gi zhen stangs dang sbyar na tha snyad du brda'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos su grub pa'i ma <lb n="9a9"/>yin dgag go zhes gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-36-26" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            'di la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re|<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3735"> ka ma la shi la</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780"> chos mchog</rs> ltar na| mngon sum dang rtog bral ma 'khrul ba gnyis grub bde gcig gam mi gcig grang | gcig na sgrub pa dang rjes su brjod pa'i don mi 'thad la| mi gcig na mtshan nyid dang mtshon byar mi <lb n="12b5"/>'thad do zhes thun mong du rtsod pa'i skyon med de| mtshan mtshon don chos dag pa ma yin la| blo ngor grub ma grub gnyis mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-24-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje pa</rs>'i zhal nas| de lta na 'drer rung 'dzin pa zhes brjod na'ang dngos su 'dres pa 'dzin pa la ma khyab pas des na sgra dang don gnyis shes pa gcig gis 'dzin pa ni 'dres rung 'dzin pa'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-24-48" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje paN Di ta</rs>'i zhal nas kyang | mngon sum tshad ma'i mtshan nyid rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid yin gyi gzhan mi dgos so zhes gsung ba'i don ni| mtshon bya mngon sum dang tshad ma gnyis yod pa bzhin du der 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rigs gnyis te| ma 'khrul ba dang tshogs pa'i rtog bral gyis mngon sum du 'jog la| rtog bral dang tshogs pa'i ma 'khrul bas tshad mar 'jog pa la dgongs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-38-34" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            de la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| khyab pa med de| gal te yod na rjes dpag la gzhal bya'i rnam pa mi snang bar thal| gzhal bya las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir gsung ba'i skyon med de| gal te snang na rjes dpag snang bas 'jug pa'i tshad mar <lb n="14b3"/>thal ba dang | rjes dpag snang yul la ma 'khrul ba'i tshad mar yang 'gyur ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-39-18" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            'di la'ang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra yod pa'ang ma yin| sgra de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin yang des gzugs 'dzin ma bskyed du chug na'ang sgra tha dad ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gog |de ma bkag par gzugs 'dzin sgra las ma skyes par mi 'grub po zer na| skyon med de| spyir de la sgra yod pa <lb n="14b8"/>tsam 'gog pa ma yin gyi gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra tha dad ldan pa ltar rung ma rang ldog sgra yin pa 'gog pa yin la| de ltar na ma dmigs pa khegs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-51-11" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re| gzhan <lb n="15b5"/>yang don ni nyer sbyor la sogs thal 'gyur gyi dbang shes rtog bral du bsgrub par thal ste| rtsa ba'i sbyor ba thal sbyor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa'i skyon med de dngos su thal ba brjod kyang | dbang shes sgra don 'dre rung 'dzin pa 'gog pa la brda' dran sngon du ma song ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu'am khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i don 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-52-49"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> de ni ma nges te| a (rya?) gar bar <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la chos bzhi so sor 'dzin pa med kyang don <lb n="16b2"/>sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa yin te | bya ba gzhan btang nas gzhan len pa'i phyir zer na | <rs type="person" ana="" ref="db:">gnyal pa yab sras</rs><!--probably gNyal zhig db 3887-->  na re | chos bzhi so sor 'dzin nus kyi stong ba rtags su 'god pas skyon med zer yang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re| ar gsar <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la ji srid chos bzhi so sor 'dzin par med pa de srid du de sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa'ang med par thal | ji srid chos bzhi sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa de srid du chos bzhi so sor 'dzin <lb n="16b3"/>pa yang yod ces gsung ba ni 'thad par mthong ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-55-16">tshad mas ma mthong ba'i don lkog shal 'dus pa nye ba nyid kyis nang gi 'du byed brda' dran pa'i bag chags yin la| de sad <lb n="18b6"/>par byas pa des dran par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na| []de'i lan la| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re| ba lang gi sgra chos can| ma mthong ba'i don nye ba las dran par 'gyur ba ma yin te ma mthong [\[]pa'i [;]ba'i [\]]don dang brda'i 'brel med par thal| rang bzhin 'brel pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro gsung ba ltar na| ba lang gtan nas ma mthong zhing ba men gyi steng du srog chags 'di 'dra ba'i ba lang zhes pa'i dud 'gro yod do ces brda' goms pa la brten nas phyis ba men mthong ba <lb n="18b7"/>na ba lang gi sgra dran pa mi srid par thal lo||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-25-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje paṇ ṭi ta</rs> ni mngon sum 'gros gsum pa yin te| don gang zhig [\[23a2\]]'dzin pa na kha phyir bltas la dbang shes dang yid shes dus mnyam pa gnyis dang | nang du de dag myong ba'i rang rig dang gsum mo||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-39-43" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed">
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> ltar na| tshad ma snga ma dbang shes chos can| gzhan la nges kyi tshad ma kho nar thal| rang yul la tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir|</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-56-59">gnyis pa mngon sum ltar snang la| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras</rs> rnams na re| brtsod pa'i lan du| yang dag gnyis su bstan| yang dag gnyis yod pa'i phyir ltar snang gnyis su <lb n="35a7"/>bstan| ltar snang gnyis yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ltar snang gi rigs logs su dbye ba dang gsum zhes gsung ngo ||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-58-08">yang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| gzhal bya ni phyi rol gyi don bden pa yin la| tshad ma ni 'dra ba chos gsum ste| ngo bo myong rtogs kyi bdag nyid rnam pa'i khyad par myong bya'i rnam pa shar ba nus pa'i khyad par myong bya la <lb n="36b"/> nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus so||[]'bras bu ni gzhal bya phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa'o||[]zhes gsung ba ni| mi 'thad de|</seg> 'o na shes pa don dang 'dra ba chos can| don rtogs kyi [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed ma yin par thal| des don rtogs su 'jog par mi nus pa'i phyir|

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-59-40">'di'i lan la| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">kho bo cag</rs>  theg pa chen po pa yang tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi tshul 'di khyod mdo sde pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa yin no zhes gsung ba ni| mi bden te| rigs pas de kho na'i don yongs su tshol ba'i skabs su rigs pa dor nas grub mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba ni| bya ba phal pa la chags pa zhes bya ba smad pa'i gnas su <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyis kyang gsungs shing | gzhung na'ang | gzung dang 'dzin pa rig <lb n="40b2"/>pa rnams||[]ces theg pa chen po pas tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi rnam bzhag 'khrul pa'i shes pa la ji ltar snang bzhin du rnam par bzhag gi |grub mtha'i rjes su zhugs nas bzhag pa ni ma yin no||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-00-38">gsum pa don snang gzhal byar bstan pa ni| 'o na don rig <lb n="42b6"/>tshad ma'i gzhal bya gang yin ce na| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| shes pa de mdo sde pa ltar du phyi rol gyi don de dang 'dra'am| rnam rig pa ltar don snang gi bag chags dang 'dra yang rung zer ba ltar na| don snang gi bag chags gzhal bya mngon gyur du thal| don rig mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir|[]des na rnam bzhag de ni rigs pa'i ra ba las [\[]rgal [;]'gal [\]]ba yin no||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-01-36">'di ni bzung ba tsam bden pa bkag nas 'dzin pa'ang bden par grub pa 'gog pa'i gzhung yin pa la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| shu lo ka gcig po 'dis dbu ma'i lta ba bsgrubs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni| dbu ma'i lta ba la sbyar du <lb n="43b3"/>mi rung [\[]pa [;]ba [\]]ma yin mod| sems tsam rnam med pa'i gzung 'dzin dang rnam pa bden pa 'gog pa'i skabs yin par shin tu gsal te| brtsod [\[-]pa [\]]spang na yang | sems tsam rnam med pa'i grub mtha' la rtsod pa spangs kyi| dbu ma pa la brtsod pa spang bar mi snang ba'i phyir ro||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-16-57">gnyis pa rang gi thal ba'i ngag la mtshungs pa spang ba la| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs>  gzhan gyis khas blangs pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur na| <rs type="person">phyogs kyi glang po yab sras</rs> kyis gzhan [\[]gyi [;]gyis [\]]khas blangs pa'i rtags kyis chos gzhan mi 'dod pa thal bar 'phen pa mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na| skyon med de| de ni khyab bya'i chos gzhan gyi rtog pas kun nas brtags nas khas blangs <lb n="93a4"/>pas khyab byed kyi chos mi 'dod pa thal bar sgrub pa ste 'phen pa yin te| khyab bya ni khyab byed med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pa| dper na phyogs gcig la mtshon na| bye brag pas ba glang gi spyi rdzas gcig yul dus rang bzhin tha dad kyi gsal ba ba lang du ma la dus cig char du 'brel bar don la yod ces dam bcas so||</seg>

            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576"> bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa shes rab 'bum</rs> gyis sbyar ba las| de nyid brjod bya'i don zab cing rgya che ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas de las khyad par du byar med kyang rjod byed kyi tshig brling zhing 'ga' zhig ngag don du mdzad de| gzhung la ma sbyar ba dang phal cher rgya 'grel ltar sbyar ba mang bas las dang po ba rnams [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]blos <lb n="153a2b"/>lang dka' bar gyur pa dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576">bdag nyid chen po</rs> de nyid kyang 'di la snon 'brid cung zad 'dra dang | zhu dag cig dgos par 'dug ste| zhes yang yang gsung ba rjes su dran pa dang | gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa mang zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor 'jug pa bde zhing brjod bya'i don rnams ma tshang ba med par ston la|[ \[]brjod [;]rjod [\]]byed kyi tshig zin pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin <lb n="153a3"/>pa ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa yab sras</rs>  kyi bka' drin la brten nas lung rigs man ngag gi gnad rnams phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing | 'chad pa dang | rtsod pa dang | rtsom pa'i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5518">bo dong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs sho re pa</rs>s| <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4369"> dpal ldan brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs><!--assumed to be the same as brag ram  mgon khang-->r <lb n="153a4"/>nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs sho||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-51-37" status="reviewed"><!--unclear whether the "kha cig" is Indian or Tibetan-->

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-52-53" status="reviewed"><!--unclear whether "kha cig" is Indian or Tibetan-->

         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex27012023-09-18-10:48:25" status="unreviewed"><pb n="[91a6]"/> <rs type="work">mdo sde kun las btus pa'i Ti ka mdo'i nyi ma'i snying po</rs> zhes bya ba| thugs kyi me long yongs <pb n="[91a7]"/>su dag pa la byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po × snang zhing<rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5908"> dben pa'i gnas</rs> la thugs gzhol ba mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3930">slob dpon dbang phyug rin chen</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs nas| mkhas pa'i skye bo chen po lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa <rs type="person" ana="">chos kyi ye shes</rs> zhes bya <pb n="[91a8]"/> ba dang <rs type="person" ana="">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> zhes bya ba'i legs par bshad pa la sgro skur gnyis dang bral bar smra ba| × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3911">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> gyis legs par sbyar ba|| × rdzogs s+O|| × ||bkra shis par gyur gcig|| </seg>

ref="db:4676">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan legs par bshad pa rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bsgrigs pa <pb n="[48a1]"/> 'di ni| lung gi sbyor ba mang po dang | 'dod lugs sna tshogs dang | dgag sgrub kyi rtsod lan mang po bris na sde snod la ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi ngo bar <pb n="[48a2]"/> dka' bas| theg pa chen po'i sa lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing rtogs sla ba| tshig gis ma sgrib pa| gsar bu thos pa chung bas bltas kyang blo la 'char bde ba cig <pb n="[48a3]"/> <rs type="work">mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> dang sbyar nas gzhung gi go ba longs pa la'ang phan par 'gyur zhing | 'jug pa bde bar bris shig zhes| bsnyen bkur| me tog bzang po dang bcas <pb n="[48a4]"/> te| dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'tsho ba'i rig byed la mkhas pa'i go 'phang thob pa| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--who is kun dga' rgyal mtshan-->kun dga' rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul ba las| btang snyoms la re shig <pb n="[48a5]"/> 'gyangs par gyur na'ang | <hi rendition="#Time">shing pho rta'i lo</hi>  ljon shing dang  sa gzhi rnaMs lo 'dab dang | <hi rendition="#Time">rtswa ljang gi myu gu skyed pa'i dus</hi> su  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5781">bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal <pb n="[48a6]"/> bzang po</rs>s yi ger bkod pa 'dis kyang  thub pa'i bstan pa dang | sems can la phan bde 'byung par gyur cig| <rs type="work">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> <abbr>thaMs cad</abbr> la sbyar ba'i bshad pa byas na'ang <pb n="[48a7]"/> ha cang rgyas pas go dka' ba'i char gyur dgos nas  lus rnam bzhag dang sbyar ba yin cing| 'di tsam zhig legs par go na  <rs type="work">'grel pa TI ka</rs> dang bcas pa bltas pas <pb n="[48b1]"/> shes par 'gyur ba lags so|| || × maNG ga laM sid d+hi × shu b+haM|| × dge’o||||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex2012023-07-10082928" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4449"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3692">bcom ldan 'das yum brgyad stong pa</rs>'i don bsdus pa</rs> <lb n="22a2"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3712">slob dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>'i rjes su 'brangs te | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyar ba las | dus phyis <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="5611">jo bo 'bum pa <!--brTan skyong, Sthirapāla--></rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs> de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang zhing <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">mang du thos pa'i dge slong shes rab 'bar</rs> gyis mdo'i don legs par gtan la phab nas yang zhus te sbyar ba |||| rdzogs s+ho ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex2012023-07-1008-32-58" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="22a3"/> yul <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5645"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5546">chos skor bsaM yas</rs> kyi lung phran mchims phu'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du mang du thos pa'i <note type="gloss">khu lha sdings pa la</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5827">dge slong ¦ bshes gnyen lha sdings pa</rs>'i gsung gi bdud rtsi <note type="gloss">(lhung pos)?</note> la ngoms ngoms su 'thungs pa <rs type="deity">bde bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byaMs pa <note type="gloss">rtsod pa myed pa rnaMs la</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5828">blo gros kyi snang pa rab tu rgyas pa khyung po 'dul ba 'dzin pa</rs>'i spyan sngar <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> mchod nas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4451"><note type="gloss">lho brag rong pa</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4451"/>bla ma 'od</rs> kyis yig mkhan byas nas bris so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-28-48" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"> phan mdzad kun gyi bgrod pa cig pa'i laM || <rs type="deity" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">ma phaM</rs> rgyal sras daM pa legs bzhag de || blo chen <choice><sic>brtan</sic><corr>bstan</corr></choice> pa'ï sgron ma <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3758">dbyig <choice><orig>‹g›nyen</orig><reg>gnyen</reg></choice></rs> gis || blo <choice><orig>myi{°}g</orig><reg>myig</reg></choice> ldan pa rnaMs la gsal bar <choice><sic>mdzod</sic><corr>mdzad</corr></choice> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-20-02" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"> de las bsod <choice><sic>rnaMs</sic><corr>nams</corr></choice><choice><orig>(thob)</orig><reg>thob</reg></choice> des sa steng 'dir || 'gro ba'i <lb n="24b11"/> <choice><sic>bugs</sic><corr>dbugs</corr></choice> 'byin byaMs chen gshags pa na || mnyes byas chos sgor mngon du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bdag</rs> bzhugs nas || chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba'i mun sel shog || || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-17-43" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon">

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex11320240828_1" status="unreviewed">don gyi de nyid dpyad pa ni | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5557">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5629">zhi ba bzang po</rs> la sogs pa na re | sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni | shes pa las gzhan ma yin te | rang rig rig par bya ba'i phyir ro || de la phyogs chos ni nyams su myong bas nges so || khyab pa yang rig par bya ba 'gal ba la ni rig par byed pa yang 'gal bas khyab ste | des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no || 'di ltar sngon po rang gi rang bzhin rig pa nyid kyis rig na de rang gi rang bzhin kho na'o || byed pa gzhan gyis rig na ni rig pa yang gzhan kho na'o || des na rig par bya pa tha dad pa la rig par byed pa tha dad pas khyab pas khyad par nges so zhe'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1132023-07-2114-52-30" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n=""/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4445">tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i dka' ba'i gnas rnam par bshad pa</rs> ||| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba shag kya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o ||  ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1132023-10-18-13:34:01" status="unreviewed"><lb n=""/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6035">shag kya'i dge slong 'dar rin chen 'bar</rs> gyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos so ||| ||||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex94032023-09-09-12.28" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5354">kyi ston dpal ldan rdor rje</rs>'i phyag dper ||</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61062023-09-26-095619" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun pa ze'u chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pas bsngags pa snar thang gyi dben <abbr>gnas</abbr></rs><abbr>su</abbr> bris shis [shing ?] phyag dpe la btugs (=gtugs?) ste dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr>||<anchor xml:id="a1"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241645" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4433">dag yig nye mkho bsdus <choice><corr>pa</corr><sic>pe</sic></choice><note type="editorial">A vowel <mentioned>e</mentioned> was mistakenly added to <mentioned>pa</mentioned>, no deletion is visible.</note></rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241649" status="reviewed"><pb n="1b"/><lb n="1b1"/> na mo <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">gu ru</rs> |
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4433">dag yig nyer mkho bsdus pa</rs> <abbr>bzhugs</abbr> zhes bya ba |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241653" status="reviewed">don 'di brjod pa la tshig 'di <lb n="1b2"/>dang 'di 'jug go zhes bde blag tu rtog par bya ba'i phyir <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4433">bstan bcos 'di</rs> rtsom mo <choice><reg>|</reg><orig/></choice></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241654" status="reviewed">de la <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4433">bstan bcos 'di</rs>'i sdom tshig ni | spyir bstan grangs nges tshig phrad dang | 'phul dang brten pa'i spang blang dang | dmigs gsal <lb n="1b3"/> so sor dbye ba ste || rnam pa lnga yis bsdus pa yin || zhes bya'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241655" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> sa mthar shes zhes zer | mi 'thad par mthong <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference"><choice><sic>kho ba</sic><corr>kho bo</corr></choice></rs>s 'dor |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241656" status="reviewed">ga da ba cig sa mthar shig | rkyang pa'i rjes su 'ang yin te dper | shog cig sod cig rgyob cig ces | gyis shig <lb n="4a4"/>ces ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> smra |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-24.16.57" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="4433">dag yig nye mkho bsdus pa</rs> <pb n="9a"/><lb n="9a5"/> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis phyogs gcig tu sdebs pa'o ||</seg> || sarba mang+ga laM ||

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex27012023-09-18-10:48:25" status="unreviewed"><pb n="[90a4]"/><rs type="work">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rtoGS pa'i rgyan 'grel pa bcas pa'i rnaM bshad laM gyi rim pa snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba 'di <rs type="person" ana="">thams cad</rs> <rs type="person" ana="">mkhyen pa 2 pa graGS pa rgyamtsho</rs>'i<anchor xml:id="a2"/> <pb n="[90a5]"/> zhabs gdul [=rdul] spyi bos len cing lung riGS kyi chos la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> cung zhig rgyas pa <rs type="person" ana="">lum bu ba bsod naMs dpal</rs> gyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5658">'tshal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r <?oxy_comment_start comment="G30"?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id="a3"/> sbyar ba ni re shig rdzogs s+ho||</seg>
